thanks. beenmore than 20 yrs since i heard ta-pocketa-pocketa-pocketa-pocketa-pocketa.
I lived in los angeles then. now i live in perth amboy and was surprised to see sign in opening scene, a little research and walter mitty is from perth amboy.
Thanks Madmax, seems like you know the good stuff.  It's hard to beat Danny Kaye.
glad you like it.  He was great.  Sing, dance, act
